summary: Dan Rather  is an American journalist and reporter.
full_text: Wharton is a city in Wharton County, Texas, United States. This city is sixty miles southwest of Houston. The population was 8,832 at the 2010 census. It is the county seat of Wharton County and is located on the Colorado River of Texas just south of U.S. Highway 59 .
title: Wharton, Texas
